maxDepth.name: Max Depth
maxDepth.hint: The maximum depth of the RollData Actor tree to display

showForDMOnly.name: Show for DM only
showForDMOnly.hint: Display the 'Show Attributes' Header Button only to the DM

systemWarning.name: System Warning
systemWarning.hint: Shows a warning chat message if the system does not enrich Descriptions with RollData. Only shown once, then it is automatically deactivated.
